action.action-desc: Mrs. Black (for herself and Ms. Stefanik) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Education and the Workforce

form.official-title: To amend the Fair Labor Standards Act of 1938 to harmonize the definitions of employee with the common law.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Harmonization of Coverage Act of 2017.

section.header: Amendments to the Fair Labor Standards Act of 1938 to harmonize the definition of employee

subsection.text: Section 3(e)(1) of the Fair Labor Standards Act of 1938 (29 U.S.C. 203(e)(1)) is amended by inserting before the period the following: , as determined under the usual common law rules (as applied for purposes of section 3121(d) of the Internal Revenue Code of 1986).
Section 3(g) of the Fair Labor Standards Act of 1938 (29 U.S.C. 203(g)) is amended by inserting an employee after permit.
